name: Super Mario on Scratch 4 - HTML Port
name_original: Super Mario on Scratch 4 - HTML Port
description:
This is Super Mario on Scratch 4 that is now ported to itch.io!

It may take a little while to load.

Here is the game running on Scratch https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/404447290/

Credits -

Music: 

ANOMALIE - MÉTROPOLE

Nintendo for Mario and most of the sounds/music. 

@swiftgtah for some of the sounds

Gameplay:

Mario text style by @Olivermario12

Scrolling engine by @griffpatch

Intro by @27jdbloom

Me for most of the art.

Special Thanks to:

@_meow_gobo_

@b1048546

@Bunnynightfan

@MarioRocks11 on Scratch

@triangle5820

@swiftgtah
